name: Full Stack Development
description:
Using a stack including: Next.js, React, Tailwind, MongoDB, and Typescript I created this website, take a look at the GitHub for more details. I have also utilized Node.js to create websites without Next.js.
I have experience using linteres, mostly ESLint as I have used for this project. I have experience using the Mocha and Jest testing frameworks.

name: Version Control and CI / CD
description: Using GitHub, ESLint, Mocha, and Docker containers I have experience creating and running unit tests as well as linting tests for websites. Using docker containers I have also set up automatic deployment for branches.

name: C / C++
description: Using C I have developed an application to make CURL calls from JSON files. I have also contributed to open sources projects in C++, specifically CDDA, where I helped fix and write tests.

name: Mobile Development with Flutter
description: Using Flutter I developed part of a note taking application. This experience taught me a lot about laying out components and front end design in general.

name: Java
description: Using Java and the CUP and FLEX libraries I created a compiler for a C-like language
